attach_disk_size.description: Specifies the size of the additional data disk for the CBH HA instance.

auto_renew.description: Specifies whether auto renew is enabled.

charging_mode.description: Specifies the charging mode of the CBH HA instance.

data_disk_size.description: The data disk size of the CBH HA instance.

enterprise_project_id.description: Specifies the enterprise project ID to which the CBH HA instance belongs.

flavor_id.description: Specifies the product ID of the CBH server.

floating_ip.description: Specifies the floating IP address of the CBH HA instance.

ipv6_enable.description: Specifies whether the IPv6 network is enabled.

master_availability_zone.description: Specifies the availability zone name of the master instance.

master_id.description: The ID of the master instance.

master_private_ip.description: Specifies the private IP address of the master instance.

name.description: Specifies the name of the CBH HA instance.

password.description: Specifies the password for logging in to the management console.

period.description: Specifies the charging period of the CBH HA instance.

period_unit.description: Specifies the charging period unit of the CBH HA instance.

power_action.description: Specifies the power action after the CBH HA instance is created.

public_ip_id.description: Specifies the ID of the elastic IP.

region.description: Specifies the region in which to create the CBH HA instance.

security_group_id.description: Specifies the IDs of the security group.

slave_availability_zone.description: Specifies the availability zone name of the slave instance.

slave_id.description: The ID of the slave instance.

slave_private_ip.description: Specifies the private IP address of the slave instance.

status.description: The status of the CBH HA instance.

subnet_id.description: Specifies the ID of a subnet.

version.description: The current version of the CBH HA instance image.

vpc_id.description: Specifies the ID of a VPC.
